description.en:
The "romance that begins at a laundromat" centers on Mikage, a 19-year-old down-on-her-luck student in a cram school for an art college. One day, when skipping school to do her laundry, she meets a sullen-looking boy reading manga at the laundromat.

[From blueberry]A heart-racing, refreshing laundromat love between Mikage, a cram school student aiming for an Arts college and Toudou, a student attending a feeder high school.

Español:[spoiler]
"El romance que comienza en una lavandería automática".
Mikage es una estudiante de 19 años con mala suerte atendiendo clases intensivas para una escuela de arte. Un día, cuando falta a la escuela para lavar la ropa, conoce a un chico de aspecto hosco que lee manga en la lavandería.[/spoiler]
